website_summaries.verdict: This model stands out for its innovative handle design, and its potential for multiple uses including a surprisingly useful paper cutter.
pros: This strong and well-built tool cuts easily through commonly-used gauges of copper and soft wire, and can even cut through thin plastic
Owners report using the paper cutting tool on job sites more than they expected, along with the popular wire stripping and crimping tools
The insulated handle grips are designed to conform to fingers while staying in place on the handles, even with frequent usage
The grip is noticeably comfortable when compared to other models
cons: These are bulkier than many handheld wire cutters, meaning users with smaller hands may struggle with this model

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for the money. Finally someone designed a tool with what I use most in the HVAC/R trade. Diagnal cutter, stripper and crimper. High quality so far. I want the needle nose version also. I can't find it on Amazon yet.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Get them now...
customer_reviews.text: FIVE stars earned here. For years I have used the thin wire cutters and "worked around" the thin handles and weak spring. "Snip" like pasta, and strip the wire without diveting the copper. Very nice in the hand and smooth. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zborn

customer_reviews.title: Field test results...check actual images
customer_reviews.text: Just take a closer look at the shape of wire cut after 2 days of use. P.S I didn't use this for cutting iron wire or something higher density than the copper. The blades are not that sharp even after applying a lots of effort it didn't cut it all the way through. Stripping the wire needs a lots of effort. Pros... use it for cutting pneumatic tubes only.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain DiggerTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: The handles are not cushions and the cutters stick. No star if I can.
customer_reviews.text: These handles are not soft and not for electric work. The cutters stick hard in closed or opened positions. I've soaked these for a week in penetrant liquid and with two hands, worked the axis a thousand times to loosen up the movement but they still stick. Not even worth giving them to your foe
customer_reviews.author: Mur Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutters
customer_reviews.text: These aren't "top of the line" cutters but they are great for once or twice a week use. Handles seem to slide off so a little loctite will keep them on. Stands up to my crew using them so I will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Best chioce for electricans!!!
customer_reviews.text: I won't lie, I bought these for the price but they are my absolute favorite and 'go-to' strippers, dykes, crimper, and linesman. As an electrician I live by these. Personally I have 4 pairs of them in my toolbag and toolbox because I don't dknow how long they'll manufacture them but I know I love them so I'm keeping as many as I can... reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: I've had chanel locks, vise grip and some other really well in known brand that i can't recall atm. These hold up better for my use at least. I'm Technician for an industrial laundry mat and I cut wire plastic canvas and other materials and these are so far my favorite until I try or find something else. Buy to your use. These are great for me
customer_reviews.author: SA2CE

customer_reviews.title: Replaces 3 tools in my bag
customer_reviews.text: I carry a tool bag at work, and this helps cut down the overall weight of the bag (it gets heavy lugging a bag around all day). I try to make all the tools in by bag have more than one purpose to cut down weight.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Keeton

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice side cutters even has a crimper and wire stripers
customer_reviews.author: David from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk don’t buy I went to use it for the first time to cut My headphone wire and it snapped almost took my eye out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband Said he likes them and never seen anything like it before. He has several pairs of different kinds Uses these for the house only.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: they don't last
customer_reviews.text: they worked half way through the first project. The first two cuts thru 14 gauge romax were fine. When I went to make the third cut they were very stiff to open or close, they are unusable now. I soaked in oil over night but made no difference. I tried to return them today, but its one day after the return window! WHAT A JOKE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low voltage techs dream tool
customer_reviews.text: Solid side cutter with strippers and crimper. I run outdoor cat5 with a ground wire and this tool takes the place of two tools; side cutters and stripper/crimpers. Save room in your tool bag, buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These are a quality tool. A bit more expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a quality tool. A bit more expensive and heavy than I would normally get, but they are an improvement in what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Although that I haven't use it yet in heavy job, but it seems to be heavy duty and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Al-Botaif

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Super tight and the strippers did not even close fully. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this tool.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he said they were a great time saver. He uses them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool. Wire stripper and cutter working perfect. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: farshad aminian

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and well made
customer_reviews.text: The side cutters are well made and operate smoothly. They're full size and the cutting edges are sharp. I recommend these to anyone looking for a good pair of side cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sutter

customer_reviews.title: good pliers nice functions
customer_reviews.text: i like it so far does what i need to do, no flaws so far
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: Good product, ok service
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is great, but I received what must have been a return. There were clear signs of use and it was dirty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Sharp durable addition to my toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Very sharp and the wire stripper portion of the tool is the easiest I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend them and buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Nice having Diagonal pliers and strippers all in one. Cutting wire and nails easily. Tough !
customer_reviews.author: TAT

customer_reviews.title: Side cutters
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good side cutters. They get the job done. Only issue is that the actual cutting part is kind of small but over all super awesome tool
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing tool 2 for 1
customer_reviews.text: Very handy tool to add to you’re tool box. Excellent in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Catastrophic failure due to poor performance
customer_reviews.text: First 10g whip wire chipped the tip of these garbage things right up absolute garbage do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Robert Houston

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay lined up and stops cutting well , handle is sliding off
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. Looks cool, great price
customer_reviews.text: Look cool. Quality. Sharp, handy and replaced 3 tools with this one. Awesome. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chris stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good tool for low Voltage jobs. I can trim a house with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: can get you easy between the fingers slow down be mind full
customer_reviews.author: INNSystemz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great, Do more with just one tool in your hand. Would get another pair
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kerstiens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service
customer_reviews.text: Under promised and over delivered. I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great functioning pliers!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pair of pliers! Well sharpened so that cutting edges line up well. Easily cuts steel wire and plastic ties. I love buying from Amazon and will like it more when they stop doing business with the NRA!
customer_reviews.author: Gman

product_meta.title: Side Cutting Pliers, Industrial Pliers with Wire Stripper/Crimper/Cutter Function, Heavy Duty Cutter Plier, 8 inch NEWACALOX (Grey)
feature_bullets: Durable nickel chromium steel construction and Induction hardened cutting edge stays sharper, long service life.
The handle made by environmental PP+TPR materials, proTouch grips provide extra comfort and reduces hand fatigue.
Multifunctional: This tool can be used as wire stripper also works as a wire cutter,paper cutter.
Easy to use ,thicken the metal portion, save your force when you use this tool; tool joint have reserved reasonable gaps to reduce friction loss.
Application:professional home improvement tools,excellent,can used for metal wire,cable cutter/crimper/ stripper,also can cutter the thin plastics.
